cardsInNoDeck.name: Battle OX
cardsInNoDeck.description: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Axe Raider
cardsInNoDeck.description: An axe-wielding monster of tremendous strength and agility.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Yomi Ship
cardsInNoDeck.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Destroy the monster that destroyed this card.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Horn Imp
cardsInNoDeck.description: A small fiend that dwells in the dark, its single horn makes it a formidable opponent.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Silver Fang
cardsInNoDeck.description: A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Suijin
cardsInNoDeck.description: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Fireyarou
cardsInNoDeck.description: A malevolent creature wrapped in flames that attacks enemies with intense fire.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Curtain of the dark ones
cardsInNoDeck.description: A curtain that a spellcaster made, it is said to raise a dark power.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Feral Imp
cardsInNoDeck.description: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Dark magician
cardsInNoDeck.description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Wattkid
cardsInNoDeck.description: A creature that electrocutes opponents with bolts of lightning.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Baby dragon
cardsInNoDeck.description: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Hero of the east
cardsInNoDeck.description: Feel da strength ah dis sword-swinging samurai from da Far East.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Battle warrior
cardsInNoDeck.description: A warrior that fights with his bare hands!!!

cardsInNoDeck.name: Crawling dragon
cardsInNoDeck.description: This weakened dragon can no longer fly, but is still a deadly force to be reckoned with.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Flame manipulator
cardsInNoDeck.description: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as "Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire".

cardsInNoDeck.name: Blue-Eyes white dragon
cardsInNoDeck.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Crab Turtle
cardsInNoDeck.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Turtle Oath". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Skull Guardian
cardsInNoDeck.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Novox's Prayer". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 7 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Slot Machine
cardsInNoDeck.description: The machine's ability is said to vary according to its slot results.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Haniwa
cardsInNoDeck.description: An earthen figure that protects the tomb of an ancient ruler.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Man-Eater Bug
cardsInNoDeck.description: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Gate Guardian
cardsInNoDeck.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Sanga of the Thunder", "Kazejin", and "Suijin".

cardsInNoDeck.name: Scanner
cardsInNoDeck.description: Once per turn, you can select 1 of your opponent's monsters that is removed from play. Until the End Phase, this card's name is treated as the selected monster's name, and this card has the same Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as the selected monster. If this card is removed from the field while this effect is applied, remove it from play.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Bitron
cardsInNoDeck.description: A new species found in electronic space. There's not much information on it.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Marshmallon
cardsInNoDeck.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card was attacked, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: The attacking player takes 1000 damage.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Beast King Barbaros
cardsInNoDeck.description: You can Normal Summon/Set this card without Tributing, but its original ATK becomes 1900. You can Tribute 3 monsters to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. If Summoned this way: Destroy all cards your opponent controls.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Texchanger
cardsInNoDeck.description: Once per turn, when your monster is targeted for an attack: You can negate that attack, then Special Summon 1 Cyberse Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or GY.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Leotron
cardsInNoDeck.description: A territorial electronic monster that guards its own domain.

cardsInNoDeck.name: The Calculator
cardsInNoDeck.description: The ATK of this card is the combined Levels of all face-up monsters you control x 300.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Alexandrite Dragon
cardsInNoDeck.description: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Mirage Dragon
cardsInNoDeck.description: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Herald of Creation
cardsInNoDeck.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Level 7 or higher monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Exploder Dragon
cardsInNoDeck.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Destroy the monster that destroyed it. Neither player takes any battle damage from attacks involving this attacking card.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Warrior Dai Grepher
cardsInNoDeck.description: The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Dark Blade
cardsInNoDeck.description: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Wattaildragon
cardsInNoDeck.description:
Capable of indefinite flight. Attacks by wrapping its body with electricity and ramming into opponents.
IMPORTANT: Capturing the "Wattaildragon" is forbidden by the Ancient Rules and is a Level 6 offense, the minimum sentence for which is imprisonment for no less than 2500 heliocycles.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Terratiger, the Empowered Warrior
cardsInNoDeck.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand in Defense Position.

cardsInNoDeck.name: The Tricky
cardsInNoDeck.description: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Spiral Serpent
cardsInNoDeck.description: When huge whirlpools lay cities asunder, it is the hunger of this sea serpent at work. No one has ever escaped its dreaded Spiral Wave to accurately describe the terror they experienced.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Command Knight
cardsInNoDeck.description: All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If you control another monster, monsters your opponent controls cannot target this card for an attack.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Trap Hole
cardsInNoDeck.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Mirror Force
cardsInNoDeck.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Magic Cylinder
cardsInNoDeck.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Mind Crush
cardsInNoDeck.description: Declare 1 card name; if that card is in your opponent's hand, they must discard all copies of it, otherwise you discard 1 random card.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Torrential Tribute
cardsInNoDeck.description: When a monster(s) is Summoned: Destroy all monsters on the field.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Time Seal
cardsInNoDeck.description: Skip the Draw Phase of your opponent's next turn.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Negate Attack
cardsInNoDeck.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Solemn Warning
cardsInNoDeck.description: When a monster(s) would be Summoned, OR when a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated that includes an effect that Special Summons a monster(s): Pay 2000 LP; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy it.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Magic Jammer
cardsInNoDeck.description: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Call of The Haunted
cardsInNoDeck.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Vanity's Emptiness
cardsInNoDeck.description: Neither player can Special Summon monsters. If a card is sent from the Deck or the field to your Graveyard: Destroy this card.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Wall of Revealing Light
cardsInNoDeck.description: Activate by paying any multiple of 1000 Life Points. Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack if their ATK is less than or equal to the amount you paid.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Monster Reborn
cardsInNoDeck.description: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Terraforming
cardsInNoDeck.description: Add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Pot of Greed
cardsInNoDeck.description: Draw 2 cards.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Raigeki
cardsInNoDeck.description: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Change of Heart
cardsInNoDeck.description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Swords of Revealing Light
cardsInNoDeck.description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Harpie's Feather Duster
cardsInNoDeck.description: Destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Dark Hole
cardsInNoDeck.description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Supply Squad
cardsInNoDeck.description: Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Spell Absorption
cardsInNoDeck.description: Each time a Spell Card is activated, gain 500 Life Points immediately after it resolves.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Messenger of peace
cardsInNoDeck.description: Monsters with 1500 or more ATK cannot declare an attack. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 100 LP or destroy this card.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Twin Twisters
cardsInNoDeck.description: Discard 1 card, then target up to 2 Spells/Traps on the field; destroy them.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Mystical space typhoon
cardsInNoDeck.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Ring of defense
cardsInNoDeck.description: When a Trap effect that inflicts damage is activated: Make that effect damage 0.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Yami
cardsInNoDeck.description: All Fiend and Spellcaster monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Fairy monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Forest
cardsInNoDeck.description: All Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Closed Forest
cardsInNoDeck.description: All Beast-Type monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each monster in your Graveyard. Field Spell Cards cannot be activated. Field Spell Cards cannot be activated during the turn this card is destroyed.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Umiiruka
cardsInNoDeck.description: Increase the ATK of all WATER monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Sword of dark destruction
cardsInNoDeck.description: A DARK monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Black Pendant
cardsInNoDeck.description: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

cardsInNoDeck.name: United We Stand
cardsInNoDeck.description: The equipped monster gains 800 ATK/DEF for each face-up monster you control.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Magnum Shield
cardsInNoDeck.description:
Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. Apply this effect, depending on its battle position.
● Attack Position: It gains ATK equal to its original DEF.
● Defense Position: It gains DEF equal to its original ATK.

cardsInNoDeck.name: Advanced Ritual Art
cardsInNoDeck.description: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any 1 Ritual Monster. You must also send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster.
